metadata.title: CVE-2019-18811 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: A memory leak in the sof_set_get_large_ctrl_data() function insound/soc/sof/ipc.c in the Linux kernel through 5.3.9 allows attackers tocause a denial of service (memory consumption) by triggeringsof_get_ctrl_copy_params() failures, aka CID-45c1380358b1.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
